sceptre 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • SCEPTRE at scale

    sceptre: robustly infer regulatory relationships in single-cell CRISPR screens

    sceptre is an R package for single-cell CRISPR screen analysis. sceptre infers gene-perturbation associations by modeling the random assortment of CRISPR guide RNAs among cells instead of modeling gene expression, thereby remaining valid despite confounder presence and arbitrary misspecification of the gene expression model.

    Installation

    Install the package from Github via the following command:

    install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("timothy-barry/sceptre")
